div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: The Kickapoo School Board has two new members as a result of the election held on April 7th. The board of canvassers completed their duties yesterday and the results are: District 1 Dan...

Couleecap Launches New Program for La Crosse and Vernon County Residents Unemployed Due to COVID-19
Couleecap is launching the COVID-19 Financial Assistance Program for low-to-moderate wage...
Hello Kickapoo MS/HS students, I wanted to touch base regarding the situation we have all become part of the last 2 weeks. At this point in time you have nearly completed your first full week of...

Hello Seniors and Senior Parents,
Please know we will be talking with class officers and getting class input next week regarding yard signs, posters, and other graduation related items. We know this has been a very difficult situation. Please know we are thinking about you and will continue to plan based on the information and guidelines we have. Our ongoing goal will be that we have a ceremony by the end of summer. Please keep your heads up and doing your best with the things you can control. We’re all hoping for the best!

April 13-17 is Tornado & Severe Weather Awareness Week in WI. In the absence of practicing this in school, please discuss weather safety at home, look over your plans, and identify shelter areas. MAKE A PLAN @ https://readywisconsin.wi.gov/make-a-plan/family-meeting-places/
